name: mini_database
description: Progetto con Express, Prisma e SQLite

scripts.kill: node -e "require('child_process').exec(process.platform==='win32' ? 'for /f \"tokens=5\" %a in (\'netstat -ano ^| findstr :3000\') do taskkill /PID %a /F' : 'lsof -ti :3000 | xargs kill -9', (err, out)=>console.log(out||err))"
